message: This proposal divides the money equally, ensuring a fair share for both players.
I'll take the majority of the money, but I'll give you a small share to keep the game going.
I propose a new division, aiming for a more equitable split considering the value of money decreases with each round.
I'll give you a tiny fraction, but I'm taking the lion's share to maximize my gain before the money loses more value.
I believe in fairness. This offer splits the money equally, ensuring both of us benefit equally despite the diminishing value of money.
